resources.string: In this example you will learn about how you can set your own custom tab names and tab icons to your content
In this example you will see how to use mustache processing to dynamically set content to existing html
In this example we will showcase how you can inject CSS and javascript in your html
In this example we will showcase how to handle login redirects that can be handled natively
In this example you will learn how to create custom intercepts to url requests
